item.title: How to send Slack Messages with Groovy
item.description: Recently I have been searching projects for send messages to Slack Channel, and I found many purposes, but I had choose one, and I’ll show you how to use it. It’s very easy! First, you have to go to your slack team, and click on “Apps & Integrations”. Search and choose “Incoming WebHooks”. Add Configuration: choose a channel, and Add Integration. You will get a Webhook URL.
